reviews.review_text: Can't live without this little gem!!!

title: Cereal Magazine: Travel & Style - Volume 10
summary:
In this issue, we feature three travel chapters: Northern California, USA; Antwerp, Belgium; and Panama City, Panama. In our style section, we present an interview with the curator of the Agnes Martin retrospective at Tate Modern; an interview with the force behind furniture brand Vitsoe; a profile on Swiss master watchmaker Audemars Piguet; as well as a fashion editorial on timepieces and an interiors editorial on the perfect reading room.

Our literary supplement discusses the subject of 'ego' and includes a poem, short story and an interview about the topic with editor of The Gentlewoman, Penny Martin.
story_arc: Opens with good fortunes, but doomed to fail
